column5: Not sure what ol' Bill was thinking?  http://www.wwnytv.com/story/35549995/hunting-guide-pleads-guilty-in-deaths-of-protected-birds
He was thinking "show me the money". Now he can show them the money.

" Under the plea deal, Saiff will be ordered to pay a $5,000 fine. He will also be prohibited from any hunting or guiding activities (other than fishing) until January 1, 2019. Saiff also agreed to make charitable donations totaling $10,000 to non-profit wildlife organizations of his choice. He could have faced a maximum prison sentence of up to one year and a fine of up to $100,000 per count. "  Not much of a spanking? Another sportsman for fun and profit?
Someone like that should get banned for life because of his obvious knowledge of the laws.
I remember watching his fishing shows many years ago. He was based out of Henderson Harbor, NY and it was also on public television.
